main event: A sighting of one or more large, irregular lights, colored white and green, was reported in Beverly, Massachusetts on August 31, 1957.
interesting points: The lights exhibited rather rapid flight and hovering behavior., One light accelerated rapidly and disappeared after hovering., The observation lasted about 1 minute., The altitude of the light was approximately 10,000 ft., No unusual radar tracks were noted in the area according to GCI's analysis.
sighted object: large, irregular, white and green lights
